summary: It was supposed to be an adventure of a lifetime as three young girls spend the summer in Thailand. But their adventure quickly becomes a nightmare when the trio unleashes the spirit of a murdered child with only one thing on her mind - revenge.
cast: Ciara Hanna|Emily O'Brien|Jackie Moore|Russell Geoffrey Banks|Byron Gibson|Jack Prinya|Sohanne Bengana|Jared Cohn|Sara Malakul Lane|Wallop Terathong|Flint Bangkok|Irada Hoyos|Warakorn Jitpat|Thanchanok Kaewta|Alexandra Merle|Boonchu Namjaidee|Todstham Piumsomboon|Pisit Sangkaew|Chanokporn Suwanposri|James Cullen Bressack
title: Pernicious
